query.name: findByStudyAndHandle
query.sql: select spv.* from study_parameter_value spv, study_parameter sp where spv.study_id=? and sp.handle=? and spv.parameter= sp.handle

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE study_parameter_value SET value=? WHERE study_id=? and parameter=?

query.name: findParamConfigByStudy
query.sql: select spv.*, sp.* from study_parameter sp, study_parameter_value spv where spv.study_id=? and sp.handle = spv.parameter
